languages.text: "Боюсь, твой век слишком скоротечен, а память слаба, чтобы вместить все мои знания. Мой народ правил звездами, когда твой еще не имел имени. Но многое из наших песен и историй было утрачено, украдено у нас {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Той, Что Жаждет{/g}. Я могу сказать тебе, что {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Дети Азуриана{/g} жили, творили, перебирали звезды, как жемчужины на нитке — пока Сай'лантреш не погубила нашу великую империю в своих страшных объятьях".

traits.locale_text: "Боюсь, твой век слишком скоротечен, а память слаба, чтобы вместить все мои знания. Мой народ правил звездами, когда твой еще не имел имени. Но многое из наших песен и историй было утрачено, украдено у нас {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Той, Что Жаждет{/g}. Я могу сказать тебе, что {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Дети Азуриана{/g} жили, творили, перебирали звезды, как жемчужины на нитке — пока Сай'лантреш не погубила нашу великую империю в своих страшных объятьях".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "I am afraid your life is too fleeting and your memory too feeble to encompass the entirety of my knowledge. My people ruled the stars when yours did not even have a name. But many of our songs and stories were lost, stolen by {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}She Who Thirsts{/g}. I can tell you the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} lived, created, caressed the stars as if they were pearls on a string — until Sai'lanthresh smothered our empire in her terrifying embrace."

Но многое из наших песен и историй было утрачено, украдено у нас {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Той, Что Жаждет{/g}. Я могу сказать тебе, что {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Дети Азуриана{/g} жили, творили, перебирали звезды, как жемчужины на нитке — пока Сай'лантреш не погубила нашу великую империю в своих страшных объятьях".

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “恐怕你的生命太短暂，你的记忆也太脆弱，无法记住我所有的知识。当我的族人统治着群星时，你的族人甚至连名字都没有。然而，我们无数歌曲与故事都遗失了，被{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}饥渴女士{/g}偷走了。我可以这么说，{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}阿苏焉的子嗣{/g}曾过着宁静的生活。他们创造了群星，照顾它们，把它们当成项链上的珍珠。但后来，赛·兰斯雷什将我们的帝国扼杀在了她恐怖的怀抱之中。”
languages.original_text: "I am afraid your life is too fleeting and your memory too feeble to encompass the entirety of my knowledge. My people ruled the stars when yours did not even have a name. But many of our songs and stories were lost, stolen by {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}She Who Thirsts{/g}. I can tell you the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} lived, created, caressed the stars as if they were pearls on a string — until Sai'lanthresh smothered our empire in her terrifying embrace."

traits.locale_text: “恐怕你的生命太短暂，你的记忆也太脆弱，无法记住我所有的知识。当我的族人统治着群星时，你的族人甚至连名字都没有。然而，我们无数歌曲与故事都遗失了，被{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}饥渴女士{/g}偷走了。我可以这么说，{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}阿苏焉的子嗣{/g}曾过着宁静的生活。他们创造了群星，照顾它们，把它们当成项链上的珍珠。但后来，赛·兰斯雷什将我们的帝国扼杀在了她恐怖的怀抱之中。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "I am afraid your life is too fleeting and your memory too feeble to encompass the entirety of my knowledge. My people ruled the stars when yours did not even have a name. But many of our songs and stories were lost, stolen by She Who Thirsts. I can tell you the Children of Asuryan lived, created, caressed the stars as if they were pearls on a string — until Sai'lanthresh smothered our empire in her terrifying embrace."

languages.text: «Me temo que tu vida es demasiado efímera y tu memoria demasiado endeble para albergar la totalidad de mis conocimientos. Mi gente gobernaba las estrellas cuando la vuestra aún no tenía nombre. Pero muchas de nuestras canciones e historias se han perdido, arrebatadas por {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}la Sedienta{/g}. Puedo decirte que los {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}hijos de Asuryan{/g} vivieron, crearon y acariciaron las estrellas como si fuesen las perlas de un collar... hasta que Sai'lanthresh extinguió nuestro imperio con su aterrador abrazo».
languages.original_text: "I am afraid your life is too fleeting and your memory too feeble to encompass the entirety of my knowledge. My people ruled the stars when yours did not even have a name. But many of our songs and stories were lost, stolen by {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}She Who Thirsts{/g}. I can tell you the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} lived, created, caressed the stars as if they were pearls on a string — until Sai'lanthresh smothered our empire in her terrifying embrace."

traits.locale_text: «Me temo que tu vida es demasiado efímera y tu memoria demasiado endeble para albergar la totalidad de mis conocimientos. Mi gente gobernaba las estrellas cuando la vuestra aún no tenía nombre. Pero muchas de nuestras canciones e historias se han perdido, arrebatadas por {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}la Sedienta{/g}. Puedo decirte que los {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}hijos de Asuryan{/g} vivieron, crearon y acariciaron las estrellas como si fuesen las perlas de un collar... hasta que Sai'lanthresh extinguió nuestro imperio con su aterrador abrazo».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「残念だが、お前の人生はあまりにもはかなく、その記憶力は我の知識のすべてを網羅するには弱すぎる。我が種族が星々を支配していた頃、お前たちには名前すらなかった。だが、我々の歌や物語の多くは失われた。{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}かの渇きたる女{/g}によって奪われたのだ。{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリアンの御子ら{/g}が生き、創造し、星々をまるで真珠のように愛でていたことは知っている…セランスレッシュがその恐ろしき抱擁によって、我らが帝国を窒息させるまではな」
languages.original_text: "I am afraid your life is too fleeting and your memory too feeble to encompass the entirety of my knowledge. My people ruled the stars when yours did not even have a name. But many of our songs and stories were lost, stolen by {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}She Who Thirsts{/g}. I can tell you the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} lived, created, caressed the stars as if they were pearls on a string — until Sai'lanthresh smothered our empire in her terrifying embrace."

traits.locale_text: 「残念だが、お前の人生はあまりにもはかなく、その記憶力は我の知識のすべてを網羅するには弱すぎる。我が種族が星々を支配していた頃、お前たちには名前すらなかった。だが、我々の歌や物語の多くは失われた。{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}かの渇きたる女{/g}によって奪われたのだ。{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリアンの御子ら{/g}が生き、創造し、星々をまるで真珠のように愛でていたことは知っている…セランスレッシュがその恐ろしき抱擁によって、我らが帝国を窒息させるまではな」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ich fürchte, Euer Leben ist zu kurz und Euer Gedächtnis zu schwach, um die Gesamtheit meines Lebens zu umfassen. Mein Volk herrschte bereits über die Sterne, als das Eure noch nicht einmal einen Namen hatte. Doch viele unserer Lieder und Geschichten sind verloren gegangen, gestohlen von {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Ihr, die dürstet{/g}. Ich kann Euch sagen, dass die {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Kinder von Asuryan{/g} die Sterne lebten, erschufen, liebkosten, als seien sie Perlen an einer Kette — bis Sai'lanthresh unser Reich in ihrer fürchterlichen Umarmung erstickte."
languages.original_text: "I am afraid your life is too fleeting and your memory too feeble to encompass the entirety of my knowledge. My people ruled the stars when yours did not even have a name. But many of our songs and stories were lost, stolen by {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}She Who Thirsts{/g}. I can tell you the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} lived, created, caressed the stars as if they were pearls on a string — until Sai'lanthresh smothered our empire in her terrifying embrace."

traits.locale_text: "Ich fürchte, Euer Leben ist zu kurz und Euer Gedächtnis zu schwach, um die Gesamtheit meines Lebens zu umfassen. Mein Volk herrschte bereits über die Sterne, als das Eure noch nicht einmal einen Namen hatte. Doch viele unserer Lieder und Geschichten sind verloren gegangen, gestohlen von {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Ihr, die dürstet{/g}. Ich kann Euch sagen, dass die {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Kinder von Asuryan{/g} die Sterne lebten, erschufen, liebkosten, als seien sie Perlen an einer Kette — bis Sai'lanthresh unser Reich in ihrer fürchterlichen Umarmung erstickte."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai bien peur que votre vie soit trop éphémère et votre mémoire, trop courte pour que je vous transmette la totalité de mes connaissances. Mon peuple régnait déjà sur les étoiles alors que le vôtre n'avait même pas de nom. Hélas, beaucoup de nos chansons et de nos histoires ont été perdues, volées par l'{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Assoiffée{/g}. Je peux vous dire que les {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}enfants d'Asuryan{/g} vivaient, créaient et caressaient les étoiles comme des perles sur un fil, jusqu'à ce que Sai'lanthresh étouffe notre empire dans sa terrifiante étreinte. »
languages.original_text: "I am afraid your life is too fleeting and your memory too feeble to encompass the entirety of my knowledge. My people ruled the stars when yours did not even have a name. But many of our songs and stories were lost, stolen by {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}She Who Thirsts{/g}. I can tell you the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} lived, created, caressed the stars as if they were pearls on a string — until Sai'lanthresh smothered our empire in her terrifying embrace."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai bien peur que votre vie soit trop éphémère et votre mémoire, trop courte pour que je vous transmette la totalité de mes connaissances. Mon peuple régnait déjà sur les étoiles alors que le vôtre n'avait même pas de nom. Hélas, beaucoup de nos chansons et de nos histoires ont été perdues, volées par l'{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Assoiffée{/g}. Je peux vous dire que les {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}enfants d'Asuryan{/g} vivaient, créaient et caressaient les étoiles comme des perles sur un fil, jusqu'à ce que Sai'lanthresh étouffe notre empire dans sa terrifiante étreinte. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ne yazık ki irfanımın tamamına hâkim olmana ne kısa hayatın ne de kısıtlı hafızan yeter. Senin halkının daha ismi yokken benim halkım yıldızlara hükmediyordu. Ancak {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Susayan{/g}, şarkılarımızın ve hikâyelerimizin büyük bir kısmını elimizden aldı. Sana şu kadarını söyleyebilirim; {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryan'ın Çocukları{/g} yaşadılar, yaşattılar ve ipe dizilen inciler gibi yıldızları bağırlarına bastılar. Ta ki Sai'lanthresh, dehşete düşüren benliğiyle imparatorluğumuzu çepeçevre sarana dek..."
languages.original_text: "I am afraid your life is too fleeting and your memory too feeble to encompass the entirety of my knowledge. My people ruled the stars when yours did not even have a name. But many of our songs and stories were lost, stolen by {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}She Who Thirsts{/g}. I can tell you the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} lived, created, caressed the stars as if they were pearls on a string — until Sai'lanthresh smothered our empire in her terrifying embrace."

traits.locale_text: "Ne yazık ki irfanımın tamamına hâkim olmana ne kısa hayatın ne de kısıtlı hafızan yeter. Senin halkının daha bir ismi yokken benim halkım yıldızlara hükmediyordu. Ancak şarkılarımızın ve hikâyelerimizin büyük bir kısmını {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Susayan{/g} elimizden aldı. Sana şu kadarını söyleyebilirim; {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryan'ın Çocukları{/g} yaşadılar, yaşattılar ve ipe dizilen inciler gibi yıldızları bağırlarına bastılar. Ta ki Sai'lanthresh, dehşete düşüren benliğiyle imparatorluğumuzu çepeçevre sarana dek..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
